Source file src/github.com/johnstarich/env2config/env.go

     1  package env2config
     2  
     3  import "strings"
     4  
     5  func parseEnv(envPairs []string) map[string]string {
     6  	env := make(map[string]string)
     7  	for _, kv := range envPairs {
     8  		kvItems := strings.SplitN(kv, "=", 2)
     9  		if len(kvItems) < 2 {
    10  			panic("Invalid key value pair from os.Environ()")
    11  		}
    12  		key, value := kvItems[0], kvItems[1]
    13  		if _, isSet := env[key]; !isSet {
    14  			env[key] = value
    15  		}
    16  	}
    17  	return env
    18  }
    19  
    20  func configEnvValues(name string, env map[string]string) map[string]string {
    21  	env = filterEnvPrefix(name, env)
    22  	removeEnvOpts(env)
    23  	return env
    24  }
    25  
    26  func filterEnvPrefix(prefix string, env map[string]string) map[string]string {
    27  	prefix += "_"
    28  	prefixLen := len(prefix)
    29  
    30  	prefixedEnv := make(map[string]string)
    31  	for key, value := range env {
    32  		if len(key) > prefixLen && strings.EqualFold(prefix, key[:prefixLen]) {
    33  			key = key[prefixLen:]
    34  			prefixedEnv[key] = value
    35  		}
    36  	}
    37  	return prefixedEnv
    38  }
    39  
    40  func removeEnvOpts(m map[string]string) {
    41  	const optsPrefix = "OPTS_"
    42  	for key := range m {
    43  		if len(key) > len(optsPrefix) && strings.EqualFold(key[:len(optsPrefix)], optsPrefix) {
    44  			delete(m, key)
    45  		}
    46  	}
    47  }
